hints.content:
We start at $6{:}35$ when Antoine starts judo practice.

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 6:30 to 7:30 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 6:30, 6:45, 7:00, 7:15, and 7:30 are labeled. A red circle appears on the unlabeled 6:35 tick mark. !

hints.content:
To determine what time Antoine finishes judo practice, we go **right** ${37}$ minutes from $6{:}35$.


[[☃ image 1]]

$\begin{align}
{6{:}35} +{} &\goldE{10}\text{ minutes} = 6{:}45\\\\
{6{:}45} +{} &\purpleD{15}\text{ minutes} = 7{:}00\\\\
7{:}00 +{} & \greenD{10}\text{ minutes} = {7{:}10} \\\\
7{:}10 +{} &\redD{2}\text{ minutes} = \blueD{7{:}12}
\end{align}$

options.alt: A number line labeled 6:30 to 7:30 with tick marks at every 1 minute. The tick marks at 6:30, 6:45, 7:00, 7:15, and 7:30 are labeled. A series of four arrows are shown moving left to right from the 6:35 tick mark to the 7:12 tick mark. The first arrow starts at the 6:35 tick mark and ends at the 6:45 tick mark and is labeled plus 10. The second arrow starts at the 6:45 tick mark and ends at the 7:00 tick mark and is labeled plus 15. The third arrow starts at the 7:00 tick mark and ends at the 7:10 tick mark and is labeled plus 10. The fourth arrow starts at the 7:10 tick mark and ends at the 7:12 tick mark and is labeled plus 2. !

hints.content:
Antoine finished judo at $\blueD{7{:}12} $.  

Which clock shows $\blueD{7{:}12}$?

When Antoine finishes judo practice, the clock shows:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 7 and 8 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 2. !

question.content:
Antoine's judo practice is $37$ minutes long.  Antoine starts judo practice at $6{:}35 \text { p.m.}$

**What time does the clock show when Antoine finishes judo practice?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 6 and the long hand on the third tick mark after the 11.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fe697ce68f5c9be79ce10c2226ec348bf7c68188)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand between the 7 and 8 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c806b991d7b161ee6285f0ce49f2709d4cf8c961)

![A clock with every hour labeled and tick marks every 1 minute, showing the short hand on the 7 and the long hand on the second tick mark after the 1.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fe12f82a65b1416f36e81639a497f0a580a52590)
